Package io.github.cjstehno.ersatz.impl

Class ErsatzRequestWithContent

java.lang.Object
io.github.cjstehno.ersatz.impl.ErsatzRequest
io.github.cjstehno.ersatz.impl.ErsatzRequestWithContent
All Implemented Interfaces:
Request, RequestWithContent
public class ErsatzRequestWithContent extends ErsatzRequest implements RequestWithContent
Ersatz implementation of a Request with request body content.

    • decoder

      public RequestWithContent decoder(String contentType, BiFunction<byte[],DecodingContext,Object> decoder)
      Description copied from interface: RequestWithContent
      Specifies a custom body content converter function. The function will have the client request body content as a byte array and it will be converted into the specified output type. Generally the conversion is used when comparing the client request with the configured request body expectation.
      Specified by:
      decoder in interface RequestWithContent
      Parameters:
      contentType - the content type that the convert will handle
      decoder - the conversion function
      Returns:
      a reference to this request
